committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: A bill to designate the Kern River as a national wild and scenic river.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate the North Fork Kern River and the South Fork Kern River, California, as wild and scenic rivers. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Kern River as a national wild and scenic river.
